subject: Re: [junit] Testing certain types of methods
msgSnippet: ... For every one of you, there are a hundred others who see this as a limitation of JUnit. Shame. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Vamsee Kanakala wrote:

> Absolutely! And I'm amazed at how many design mistakes I find while
> unit-testing. You're trying to test something, it feels unintuitive, and
> ka-boom! You know what's wrong. JUnit rocks!

For every one of you, there are a hundred others who see this as a
limitation of JUnit. Shame.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
